name: Corpse Unmasking
effect: One of the common and unpleasant duties of the Guardians of the Veil is to use the Death 2 Corpse Mask spell to cover up physical evidence of a magical homicide. But rogue mages can use Corpse Mask just as well as the Guardians. This spell allows the mage to detect whether or not the spell Corpse Mask had been used on a subject.
